clauses.title: License Grant
clauses.summary: ABC Corp is granted a non-exclusive, non-transferable license for the software.

clauses.title: Maintenance & Support
clauses.summary: Oracle will provide updates and support during the license term.

clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: License automatically terminates if fees are unpaid or terms are violated.

insights.message: License termination clauses could interrupt business continuity.
Renewal process may require manual negotiation.

evidence.snippet: The license granted is non-exclusive and non-transferable.
License terminates immediately if fees are not paid or terms are breached.
